      Vector Plane.getNormal(Point3D p)
      this function return the normal of the plane - if the point is on the plain
      abstract Vector Geometry.getNormal(Point3D p)
      this function is abstract and all of the geometries have to do it- to have the ability to calculate the normal of the geometry in specific point.
      Vector Cylinder.getNormal(Point3D p)
      this function return the normal of the geometry - bonus
